column3: michigan to rudolf and jennie route. he graduated from thomas e cooley high school in 1939. he married his beloved wife audrienne in 1944 and is the loving father of two children
column4: charles and deborah lewis. william graduated from general motors institute in 1943 and soon after
column5: enlisted in the u. s. army air corp where he served his country from 1944 to 1946. in 1955
column6: he graduated from wayne state university with a masters of science degree in mechanical engineering and worked as an engineer for general motors for over 47 years. as a member of the detroit yacht club for over 50 years
column7: william was able to pursue his passion for sailing.
